Description:
Detects the execution of the LaZagne. A utility used to retrieve multiple types of passwords stored on a local computer.
LaZagne has been leveraged multiple times by threat actors in order to dump credentials.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - LaZagne Execution
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" process_path="*\\lazagne.exe" OR ((process_path="*:\\PerfLogs\\*" OR process_path="*:\\ProgramData\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Temp\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Tmp\\*" OR process_path="*:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR process_path="*\\AppData\\*" OR process_path="*\\Downloads\\*" OR process_path="*\\Users\\Public\\*") (command="*.exe all" OR command="*.exe browsers" OR command="*.exe chats" OR command="*.exe databases" OR command="*.exe games" OR command="*.exe git" OR command="*.exe mails" OR command="*.exe maven" OR command="*.exe memory" OR command="*.exe multimedia" OR command="*.exe sysadmin" OR command="*.exe unused" OR command="*.exe wifi" OR command="*.exe windows")) OR ((command="*all *" OR command="*browsers *" OR command="*chats *" OR command="*databases *" OR command="*games *" OR command="*git *" OR command="*mails *" OR command="*maven *" OR command="*memory *" OR command="*multimedia *" OR command="*php *" OR command="*svn *" OR command="*sysadmin *" OR command="*unused *" OR command="*wifi *" OR command="*windows *") (command="*-oA*" OR command="*-oJ*" OR command="*-oN*" OR command="*-output*" OR command="*-password*" OR command="*-1Password*" OR command="*-apachedirectorystudio*" OR command="*-autologon*" OR command="*-ChromiumBased*" OR command="*-composer*" OR command="*-coreftp*" OR command="*-credfiles*" OR command="*-credman*" OR command="*-cyberduck*" OR command="*-dbvis*" OR command="*-EyeCon*" OR command="*-filezilla*" OR command="*-filezillaserver*" OR command="*-ftpnavigator*" OR command="*-galconfusion*" OR command="*-gitforwindows*" OR command="*-hashdump*" OR command="*-iisapppool*" OR command="*-IISCentralCertP*" OR command="*-kalypsomedia*" OR command="*-keepass*" OR command="*-keepassconfig*" OR command="*-lsa_secrets*" OR command="*-mavenrepositories*" OR command="*-memory_dump*" OR command="*-Mozilla*" OR command="*-mRemoteNG*" OR command="*-mscache*" OR command="*-opensshforwindows*" OR command="*-openvpn*" OR command="*-outlook*" OR command="*-pidgin*" OR command="*-postgresql*" OR command="*-psi-im*" OR command="*-puttycm*" OR command="*-pypykatz*" OR command="*-Rclone*" OR command="*-rdpmanager*" OR command="*-robomongo*" OR command="*-roguestale*" OR command="*-skype*" OR command="*-SQLDeveloper*" OR command="*-squirrel*" OR command="*-tortoise*" OR command="*-turba*" OR command="*-UCBrowser*" OR command="*-unattended*" OR command="*-vault*" OR command="*-vaultfiles*" OR command="*-vnc*" OR command="*-windows*" OR command="*-winscp*" OR command="*-wsl*"))
